members.name: Sinigang
members.description: Sinigang is a Filipino soup or stew characterized by its sour and savory taste.

members.name: Lechon
members.description: Lechon or suckling pig is a whole pig roasted to perfection over an open flame, resulting in crispy, golden-brown skin and tender, juicy meat.

members.name: Sisig
members.description: Sisig is a Filipino dish made from pork jowl and ears, pork belly, and chicken liver, which is usually seasoned with calamansi, onions, and chili peppers.

members.name: Afritada
members.description: Afritada is Filipino dish consisting of chicken, beef, or pork braised on tomato sauce with carrots, potatoes, and red and green bell peppers.

members.name: Adobo
members.description: Adobo is a popular Filipino dish and cooking process in the Philippines cuisine. Marinated and simmered in vinegar, salt and/or soy sauce and garlic.

members.name: Laing
members.description: Laing is a Filipino dish of shredded or whole taro leaves with meat or seafood cooked in thick coconut milk spiced with labuyo chili, lemon grass, garlic, shallots, ginger, and shrimp paste.

members.name: Pinakbet
members.description: Pinakbet is an indigenous Filipino dish from northern regions of the Philippines. It is made with variety of mixed vegetables flsvored with bagoong.

members.name: Cajun Seafoods
members.description: Cajun seafoods is made with mix seafoods flavored with cajun sauce and different herbs and spices from the Philippines.

members.name: Lumpiang Shanghai
members.description: Lumpiang Shanghai is a Filipino deep-fried appetizer consisting of a mixture of giniling with vegetables like carrots, chopped scallions or red onions and gralic, wrapped in a thin egg crepe.

members.name: Halo - Halo
members.description: Halo - Halo in a tagalog word of mixed, is a popular cold dessert in the Philippines made up of crushed ice, evaporated milk or coconut milk, and various ingredients from the Philippines.

members.name: Leche Flan
members.description: Leche Flan is a Filipino dessert also known as caramel custard is a dessert with a layer of clear caramel sauce.
